description:
Successful project management is a skilled job; and to achieve success within the defined scope and budget, it is important that project staff keep themselves updated with the latest Project Management Software.

Oracle速 Primavera is one such intelligent, flexible, and comprehensive Project Portfolio Management Solution which is easy to use. It enables you to plan, manage and control your project effectively.

However, taking time off from the busy and demanding working schedules to attend classroom-based Oracle速 Primavera Training isn't often feasible for project professionals.

No Worries - Now you have the option to enroll for a Comprehensive, Self-Paced, Easy-to-Attend Online Training Course on Oracle速 Primavera P6 v8.2

Salient Features

  • High Quality, Internet Based Course with 24/7 Access
  • Videos and Demonstrations to facilitate better understanding of the concepts
  • 40 Contact Hours/PDUs Certificate from KnowledgeWoods Consulting
  • Email based, Post Training Support for Doubts Clarification
title: Oracle速 Primavera Online Program
